script.text: I've been reading about guns lately, which is just like going to church or something you know when I get bored enough I'm gonna go check out guns because it's an interesting thing that we do with our time right now uh talking about them all the time but actually using them very rarely so what does that say about us as Americans? You know, maybe nothing good."
script.pros: Incongruous juxtaposition between gun talk and church attendance creates humor; Setup effectively primes audience for punchline.
script.cons: Muddied delivery makes it hard to discern tone and intent behind statement.

script.text: "In fact, did you guys hear recently there was a mass shooting at this place called Robb Elementary School in Uvalde Texas? Yeah? And if you haven't heard about it yet don't worry nobody has."
script.cons: Muddled delivery, Weak transition from previous component.

script.text: "Here's how little attention they got from the media here's proof you can see CNN didn't even bother to change their graphic font for the school name they're not taking it seriously either."
script.cons: Muddled delivery, Not entirely clear where the joke is headed.

script.text: "Thank God no kids were hurt by the gunshots. Unfortunately, some children did die, but only after being shot multiple times by police bullets."
script.pros: Incongruous tone creates humor, Setup effectively primes audience for punchline.
script.cons: Middling energy level makes delivery feel flat, Punchline feels more like a callback than a new piece of information.

script.text: "Like, first off, it doesn't make sense why cops would shoot innocent people who weren't armed."
But then I thought more about it, like, yeah, sure, those officers probably had traumatic childhoods, too."
script.cons: Setup feels slightly disconnected from rest of transcript.
